name: Intellect Motion
tag_list: hardware, motion-control, smart-tv, mobile, 3d, 2d, application, controller, user-interface
overview:
We bring the big screen experience for mobile in a whole new way with our wireless controllers. Use your favourite applications on your TV with our technology: all done with ease of our controllers and a standard webcam (very much like the one in your smartphone).

We allow you to translate your mobile application to the big screen through Intellect Motion’s Virtual Interfaces.

Virtual Touch Screen You are able to use your favourite 2D mobile application on the big screen with our controller. Essentially, it is very much like using a larger touch screen where you can scroll, swipe, flick ,just like when you use your smartphone, using our controllers and control the application on the big screen.

Virtual Hands Use your 3D mobile application on the big screen and control the user interface with your hands. You can rotate, view 3D objects or even access a 3D map on your big screen. Think of it as something similar to the gestures used in Iron Man.

Virtual Presence First person 3D applications are converted to the big screen and the user feels like he is actually present in the application itself; Hence similar to a immersive virtual experience. This would allow users to play 3D games, go on virtual tours or even use exploration applications.
